None.Name: Gifted Strangling
None.Description:
Every 3 seconds, tower is able to root a target enemy to the ground for 10 seconds. Rooted units are immobile but still able to use ranged attacks. After the effect wears off, target is immune
against Root for a while. Affects ground targets only.
